main event: A witness observed a whitish-blue star-like object in the sky for about 5 minutes in Lincoln Park, Michigan.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 30 minutes overall, although the witness observed the object for around 5 minutes., The object moved steadily to the West without oscillating or fluctuating in brightness., The observer reported the object resembling a comet., The report was made by a chronic reporter of UFO sightings., The object was described as a blue star in the sky.
sighted object: whitish-blue star-like object in the sky
witness description: A chronic reporter of UFO sightings, who ran outside to observe the object.
